frontmatter.title: Module 4: Principles of FAIR Scientific Publishing
frontmatter.description: This module provides fundamental principles in scientific publishing. Scientific publishing refers to the publication of all artifacts of research (not only the papers but the data, software and workflow.) Need to put it out there. Making all your resources publically accessible. to ensure that all artifacts of science are Findable, Reproducible, Interoperable, and Reusable (FAIR). [Link to full slide deck]
